import './cartItem.css' import Button from '../UI/Button' import CartContext from '../../context/cart-context' import { useContext } from 'react' const CartItem = props =>{ const cart = useContext(CartContext) const increment = ()=>{ const item = { name : props.name, amount : Number(props.amount), price : props.price, id : props.id } cart.addItem(item) } const decrement = ()=>{ console.log("--") } return
{props.name}
${props.price.toFixed(2)} {props.amount}X
} export default CartItem
